vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Βαρναβᾶς, -α, ὁ (Aram. בַּר, son, as prefix to another word interpreted in Act.4:36, τῆς παρακλήσεως, perh. נְבוּאָה, wh., however, should be rendered by προφητεία as in II Est.6:14, LXX. Deiss., BS, 309f., thinks Β. may be a variant of the name Βαρνεβοῦς, son of Nebo, found in a Syrian Inscr., altered with a view to disguising its origin; see also Milligan, NTD, iii; Dalman, Gr., 142),
Barnabas: Act.4:36 9:27 11:22, 30 12:25 13-15, 1Co.9:6, Gal.2:1, 9 13, Col.4:10.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.4.36; his mother was Mary (G3137P) ;
brother of: Mary (G3137L); also called Joseph (KJV: Joses) at Act.4.36;
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴拿巴 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在亞蘭文的意思是 "勸慰之子"
來自居比路的利未人, 名叫約瑟 (徒 4:36), 是保羅的親密同工
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
巴拿巴 这个阳性专有名词 人名在亚兰文的意思是 "劝慰之子"
来自居比路的利未人, 名叫约瑟 (徒 4:36), 是保罗的亲密同工
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: Ba-na-ba « Con của lời tiên tri, nhứt là lời tiên tri khuyên lơn yên ủi ». Xem H1247 (con) và H5029.

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, inferred at Col.4.10;
unnamed father of: Barnabas (G0921) and Mary (G3137L)
